00115 #endif

00125 #ifndef NODE_ID
00126 #define NODE_ID 0x03
00127 #endif /* NODE_ID */
00128 static void
00129 set_rime_addr(void)
00130 {
00131   rimeaddr_t n_addr;
00132   int i;
00133 
00134   memset(&n_addr, 0, sizeof(rimeaddr_t));
00135 
00136   //    Set node address
00137 #if UIP_CONF_IPV6
00138   //memcpy(addr.u8, ds2411_id, sizeof(addr.u8));
00139   n_addr.u8[7] = NODE_ID & 0xff;
00140   n_addr.u8[6] = NODE_ID >> 8;
00141 
00142   //  n_addr.u8[7] = node_id & 0xff;
00143   //  n_addr.u8[6] = node_id >> 8;
00144 
00145 #else
00146  /* if(node_id == 0) {
00147     for(i = 0; i < sizeof(rimeaddr_t); ++i) {
00148       addr.u8[i] = ds2411_id[7 - i];
00149     }
00150   } else {
00151     addr.u8[0] = node_id & 0xff;
00152     addr.u8[1] = node_id >> 8;
00153   }*/
00154   n_addr.u8[0] = NODE_ID >> 8;
00155   n_addr.u8[1] = NODE_ID & 0xff;
00156 #endif
00157 
00158   rimeaddr_set_node_addr(&n_addr);
00159   printf("Rime started with address ");
00160   for(i = 0; i < sizeof(n_addr.u8) - 1; i++) {
00161     printf("%d.", n_addr.u8[i]);
00162   }
00163   printf("%d\n", n_addr.u8[i]);
00164 }
00165 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00166 static void
00167 print_processes(struct process * const processes[])
00168 {
00169   /*  const struct process * const * p = processes;*/
00170   printf("Starting");
00171   while(*processes != NULL) {
00172     printf(" '%s'", (*processes)->name);
00173     processes++;
00174   }
00175   putchar('\n');
00176 }
00177 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00178 #if WITH_UIP
00179 static void
00180 set_gateway(void)
00181 {
00182   if(!is_gateway) {
00183     leds_on(LEDS_RED);
00184     //printf("%d.%d: making myself the IP network gateway.\n\n",
00185         //   rimeaddr_node_addr.u8[0], rimeaddr_node_addr.u8[1]);
00186     //printf("IPv4 address of the gateway: %d.%d.%d.%d\n\n",
00187          //  uip_ipaddr_to_quad(&uip_hostaddr));
00188     uip_over_mesh_set_gateway(&rimeaddr_node_addr);
00189     uip_over_mesh_make_announced_gateway();
00190     is_gateway = 1;
00191   }
00192 }
00193 #endif /* WITH_UIP */
00194 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00195 int
00196 main(int argc, char **argv)
00197 {
00198   /*
00199    * Initalize hardware.
00200    */
00201 
00202   msp430_cpu_init();
00203   clock_init();
00204   leds_init();
00205 
00206   leds_on(LEDS_ALL);
00207 
00208   uart1_init(115200); /* Must come before first printf */
00209 
00210 #if WITH_UIP
00211   slip_arch_init(115200);
00212 #endif /* WITH_UIP */
00213 
00214   //ds2411_init();
00215 
00216   /* XXX hack: Fix it so that the 802.15.4 MAC address is compatible
00217      with an Ethernet MAC address - byte 0 (byte 2 in the DS ID)
00218      cannot be odd. */
00219   //ds2411_id[2] &= 0xfe;
00220 
00221   //xmem_init();
00222 
00223   rtimer_init();
00224   /*
00225    * Hardware initialization done!
00226    */
00227 
00228 
00229   /* Restore node id if such has been stored in external mem */
00230   //node_id_restore();
00231   node_id = NODE_ID;
00232 
00233   /* for setting "hardcoded" IEEE 802.15.4 MAC addresses */
00234 #ifdef IEEE_802154_MAC_ADDRESS
00235   {
00236     uint8_t ieee[] = IEEE_802154_MAC_ADDRESS;
00237     //memcpy(ds2411_id, ieee, sizeof(uip_lladdr.addr));
00238     //ds2411_id[7] = node_id & 0xff;
00239   }
00240 #endif
00241 
00242   //random_init(ds2411_id[0] + node_id);
00243 
00244   leds_off(LEDS_BLUE);
00245   /*
00246    * Initialize Contiki and our processes.
00247    */
00248   process_init();
00249   process_start(&etimer_process, NULL);
00250 
00251   ctimer_init();
00252 
00253   init_platform();
00254 
00255   set_rime_addr();
00256 
00257   cc2520_init();
00258   {
00259     uint8_t longaddr[8];
00260     uint16_t shortaddr;
00261 
00262     shortaddr = (rimeaddr_node_addr.u8[0] << 8) +
00263       rimeaddr_node_addr.u8[1];
00264     memset(longaddr, 0, sizeof(longaddr));
00265     rimeaddr_copy((rimeaddr_t *)&longaddr, &rimeaddr_node_addr);
00266 
00267     printf("MAC %02x:%02x:%02x:%02x:%02x:%02x:%02x:%02x ",
00268            longaddr[0], longaddr[1], longaddr[2], longaddr[3],
00269            longaddr[4], longaddr[5], longaddr[6], longaddr[7]);
00270 
00271     cc2520_set_pan_addr(IEEE802154_PANID, shortaddr, longaddr);
00272   }
00273   cc2520_set_channel(RF_CHANNEL);
00274 
00275   printf(CONTIKI_VERSION_STRING " started. ");
00276   if(node_id > 0) {
00277     printf("Node id is set to %u.\n", node_id);
00278   } else {
00279     printf("Node id is not set.\n");
00280   }
00281 
00282 #if WITH_UIP6
00283   /* memcpy(&uip_lladdr.addr, ds2411_id, sizeof(uip_lladdr.addr)); */
00284   memcpy(&uip_lladdr.addr, rimeaddr_node_addr.u8,
00285          UIP_LLADDR_LEN > RIMEADDR_SIZE ? RIMEADDR_SIZE : UIP_LLADDR_LEN);
00286 
00287   /* Setup nullmac-like MAC for 802.15.4 */
00288 /*   sicslowpan_init(sicslowmac_init(&cc2520_driver)); */
00289 /*   printf(" %s channel %u\n", sicslowmac_driver.name, RF_CHANNEL); */
00290 
00291   /* Setup X-MAC for 802.15.4 */
00292   queuebuf_init();
00293   NETSTACK_RDC.init();
00294   NETSTACK_MAC.init();
00295   NETSTACK_NETWORK.init();
00296 
00297   printf("%s %s, channel check rate %lu Hz, radio channel %u\n",
00298          NETSTACK_MAC.name, NETSTACK_RDC.name,
00299          CLOCK_SECOND / (NETSTACK_RDC.channel_check_interval() == 0 ? 1:
00300                          NETSTACK_RDC.channel_check_interval()),
00301          RF_CHANNEL);
00302 
00303   process_start(&tcpip_process, NULL);
00304 
00305   printf("Tentative link-local IPv6 address ");
00306   {
00307     uip_ds6_addr_t *lladdr;
00308     int i;
00309     lladdr = uip_ds6_get_link_local(-1);
00310     for(i = 0; i < 7; ++i) {
00311       printf("%02x%02x:", lladdr->ipaddr.u8[i * 2],
00312              lladdr->ipaddr.u8[i * 2 + 1]);
00313     }
00314     printf("%02x%02x\n", lladdr->ipaddr.u8[14], lladdr->ipaddr.u8[15]);
00315   }
00316 
00317   if(!UIP_CONF_IPV6_RPL) {
00318     uip_ipaddr_t ipaddr;
00319     int i;
00320     uip_ip6addr(&ipaddr, 0xaaaa, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00321     uip_ds6_set_addr_iid(&ipaddr, &uip_lladdr);
00322     uip_ds6_addr_add(&ipaddr, 0, ADDR_TENTATIVE);
00323     printf("Tentative global IPv6 address ");
00324     for(i = 0; i < 7; ++i) {
00325       printf("%02x%02x:",
00326              ipaddr.u8[i * 2], ipaddr.u8[i * 2 + 1]);
00327     }
00328     printf("%02x%02x\n",
00329            ipaddr.u8[7 * 2], ipaddr.u8[7 * 2 + 1]);
00330   }
00331 
00332 #else /* WITH_UIP6 */
00333 
00334   NETSTACK_RDC.init();
00335   NETSTACK_MAC.init();
00336   NETSTACK_NETWORK.init();
00337 
00338   printf("%s %s, channel check rate %lu Hz, radio channel %u\n",
00339          NETSTACK_MAC.name, NETSTACK_RDC.name,
00340          CLOCK_SECOND / (NETSTACK_RDC.channel_check_interval() == 0? 1:
00341                          NETSTACK_RDC.channel_check_interval()),
00342          RF_CHANNEL);
00343 #endif /* WITH_UIP6 */
00344 
00345 #if !WITH_UIP && !WITH_UIP6
00346   uart1_set_input(serial_line_input_byte);
00347   serial_line_init();
00348 #endif
00349 
00350 #if PROFILE_CONF_ON
00351   profile_init();
00352 #endif /* PROFILE_CONF_ON */
00353 
00354   leds_off(LEDS_GREEN);
00355 
00356 #if TIMESYNCH_CONF_ENABLED
00357   timesynch_init();
00358   timesynch_set_authority_level((rimeaddr_node_addr.u8[0] << 4) + 16);
00359 #endif /* TIMESYNCH_CONF_ENABLED */
00360 
00361 #if WITH_UIP
00362   process_start(&tcpip_process, NULL);
00363   process_start(&uip_fw_process, NULL); /* Start IP output */
00364   process_start(&slip_process, NULL);
00365 
00366   slip_set_input_callback(set_gateway);
00367 
00368   {
00369     uip_ipaddr_t hostaddr, netmask;
00370 
00371     uip_init();
00372 
00373     uip_ipaddr(&hostaddr, 172,16,
00374                rimeaddr_node_addr.u8[0],rimeaddr_node_addr.u8[1]);
00375     uip_ipaddr(&netmask, 255,255,0,0);
00376     uip_ipaddr_copy(&meshif.ipaddr, &hostaddr);
00377 
00378     uip_sethostaddr(&hostaddr);
00379     uip_setnetmask(&netmask);
00380     uip_over_mesh_set_net(&hostaddr, &netmask);
00381     /*    uip_fw_register(&slipif);*/
00382     uip_over_mesh_set_gateway_netif(&slipif);
00383     uip_fw_default(&meshif);
00384     uip_over_mesh_init(UIP_OVER_MESH_CHANNEL);
00385     printf("uIP started with IP address %d.%d.%d.%d\n",
00386            uip_ipaddr_to_quad(&hostaddr));
00387   }
00388 #endif /* WITH_UIP */
00389 
00390   energest_init();
00391   ENERGEST_ON(ENERGEST_TYPE_CPU);
00392 
00393   watchdog_start();
00394   /* Stop the watchdog */
00395   watchdog_stop();
00396 
00397   print_processes(autostart_processes);
00398   autostart_start(autostart_processes);
00399 
00400   /*
00401    * This is the scheduler loop.
00402    */
00403   while(1) {
00404 
00405     int r;
00406 #if PROFILE_CONF_ON
00407     profile_episode_start();
00408 #endif /* PROFILE_CONF_ON */
00409     do {
00410       /* Reset watchdog. */
00411       watchdog_periodic();
00412       r = process_run();
00413     } while(r > 0);
00414 #if PROFILE_CONF_ON
00415     profile_episode_end();
00416 #endif /* PROFILE_CONF_ON */
00417 
00418     /*
00419      * Idle processing.
00420      */
00421     int s = splhigh();          /* Disable interrupts. */
00422     /* uart1_active is for avoiding LPM3 when still sending or receiving */
00423     if(process_nevents() != 0 || uart1_active()) {
00424       splx(s);                  /* Re-enable interrupts. */
00425     } else {
00426       static unsigned long irq_energest = 0;
00427 
00428       /* Re-enable interrupts and go to sleep atomically. */
00429       ENERGEST_OFF(ENERGEST_TYPE_CPU);
00430       ENERGEST_ON(ENERGEST_TYPE_LPM);
00431       /* We only want to measure the processing done in IRQs when we
00432          are asleep, so we discard the processing time done when we
00433          were awake. */
00434       energest_type_set(ENERGEST_TYPE_IRQ, irq_energest);
00435       watchdog_stop();
00436       _BIS_SR(GIE | SCG0 | SCG1 | CPUOFF); /* LPM3 sleep. This
00437                                               statement will block
00438                                               until the CPU is
00439                                               woken up by an
00440                                               interrupt that sets
00441                                               the wake up flag. */
00442 
00443       /* We get the current processing time for interrupts that was
00444          done during the LPM and store it for next time around.  */
00445       dint();
00446       irq_energest = energest_type_time(ENERGEST_TYPE_IRQ);
00447       eint();
00448       watchdog_start();
00449       ENERGEST_OFF(ENERGEST_TYPE_LPM);
00450       ENERGEST_ON(ENERGEST_TYPE_CPU);
00451     }
00452   }
00453 }
00454 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00455 #if LOG_CONF_ENABLED
00456 void
00457 log_message(char *m1, char *m2)
00458 {
00459   printf("%s%s\n", m1, m2);
00460 }
00461 #endif /* LOG_CONF_ENABLED */
